pullRequest.body:
induced-filtration-from-ring-hom
---

**Define a filtration induced by a homomorphism**
Including `HomtoFiltration` induced a map to `IsFiltration`, `RingHomtoFiltration` indced a ring homomorphism to `IsRingFiltration`, and `ModuleHomtoFiltration` indced a module homomorphism to `IsModuleFiltration`

authored-by: Yi Yuan @yuanyi-350

- [ ] depends on: #20900 [[define filtered ring](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20900)]

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>
